response.overview: A newlywed couple moves into a house. Her husband is not happy with her infertility but he had no choice as she could have never found a girl this pretty hence their marriage turns into a disaster. She finds solace in a mysterious neighbor and they both share their life's painful stories with each other. They connect & start falling in love. Watch Roohdaar to find out what happens next.
response.title: Roohdaar
